title: Irreducible characters of the generalized symmetric group
abstract:
The paper studies how to compute irreducible characters of the generalized
symmetric group $C_k\wr{S}_n$ by iterative algorithms. After reproving the
Murnaghan-Nakayama rule by vertex algebraic method, we formulate a new
iterative formula for characters of the generalized symmetric group. As
applications, we find a numerical relation between the character values of
$C_k\wr S_n$ and modular characters of $S_{kn}$.
